attributes.action: Reduce signatures required to 10,000 for e petitions on regional campaigns
attributes.additional_details: If national campaigns need 100,000 signatures and have the population of the whole of the UK from where to obtain them, it cannot be reasonable to expect regional campaigns to also get 100,000 signatures when the population of only a fraction of the UK would have an interest in them!  We petition the government to reduce the signatures required for regional campaigns to 10,000.
